title: There Must Be Two Sides With Chico Bean | Ep. 7
itunes:title: There Must Be Two Sides With Chico Bean | Ep. 7
description:
Karlous And DC are taping Wild N Out, so out in LA the team connected with Wild N Out cast member Chico Bean to talk about keeping it real. Karlous, DC, and Chico discuss the commandments of being real, evolution of the black man and the differences between being real and fake.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
